alert.note: Alert for Cuming (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:52AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cuming County through 515 AM CDT... At 452 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Wisner, or 14 miles northwest of West Point, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beemer around 505 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
